explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the influence of geopolitical risk on corporate cash holdings in an emerging market, specifically India. It uses fixed-effect regression models and two-stage least squares regression for analysis, which are traditional econometric methods. There is no mention or use of any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies in the title or abstract. Therefore, none of the provided keywords related to machine learning or its subfields are relevant to this study.
